domain.security

Class Group

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.security.Group
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Entity
public class Group
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Entity that virtualizes a collection of authenticated users.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
